title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
May 13, 2018
President Donald J. Trump spoke yesterday with President Emmanuel Macron of France to discuss ways to ensure reciprocal and balanced trade. President Trump also reiterated the need for a comprehensive deal that addresses all aspects of Iran’s destabilizing activities in the Middle East.
